clear-cache.confirmation-message: Are you sure you want to clear out the metadata cache?
clear-cache.effect-failure: Failed to clear the metadata cache.

delete-property.confirmation-message: Are you sure you want to the delete the {name} property?

delete-source.confirmation-message: Are you sure you want to delete the metadata source {name}?

label.expiration-days: Expiration days for metadata cache entries
label.ignore-empty-values: Do not overwrite properties using empty values.

save-source.confirmation-message: Are you sure you want to save the metadata source {name}?

tooltip.reset-source: Undo changes to the metadata source.

tooltip.preferred-source: This is the preferred metadata source.

metadata-process.page-title: Metadata Processing: ({count, plural, =1{One Comic} other{# Comics}} Selected)
metadata-process.process-status: Processed {current} Of {total, plural, =1{One Comic} other{# Comics}}

start-process.confirm-message: Are you sure you want to start a batch process to update the metadata in {count, plural, =1{one comic} other{# comics}}?
start-process.effect-failure: Failed to start metadata update process.

tooltip.start-process: Start batch updating the selected comics.

metadata-update.page-title: Metadata Processing: ({count, plural, =1{One Comic} other{# Comics}} Selected)

start-process.confirm-message: Are you sure you want to start a batch process to update the metadata in {count, plural, =1{one comic} other{# comics}}?
start-process.effect-failure: Failed to start metadata update process.

tooltip.skip-cache: Toggle skipping the metadata cache (currently {skip, select, true{on} other{off}}).
tooltip.start-process: Start batch updating the selected comics.

load-scraping-page.effect-failure: Failed to load comic books to be scraped...

remove-book.effect-failure: Failed to remove comic from multi-book metadata update...
remove-book.effect-success: Removed comic from multi-book metadata update...

comic-book-queue.title: All Comic Books To Be Scraped

placeholder.volume-filter: Enter text to filter the volumes displayed.

scraping.scrape-comic-confirmation-message: Are you sure you want to replace the details for this comic?

start-scraping.confirmation-message: Are you sure you want to replace the details for the {count, plural, =1{comic} other{# comics}} selected comics?

tooltip.auto-select-exact-match: If enabled, a single exact match will be automatically selected (shift+ctrl+x).
tooltip.confirm-each-scrape: If enabled, admins will confirm each issue selected (shift+ctrl+o).
tooltip.fetch-volumes: Load volume candidates from metadata source.
tooltip.match-publisher: Scraping will include {enabled, select, true{only matching} other{all}} publishers (shift+ctrl+p).
tooltip.remove-comic-from-queue: Remove this comic book from the scraping queue...
tooltip.skip-cache: Scraping will {enabled, select, true{skip} other{use}} the scraping cache (shift+ctrl+c).

scrape-series.confirmation-message: Are you sure you want to fetch the metadata for "{series} v{volume}", published by {publisher}?
scrape-series.effect-failure: Failed to fetch metadata for "{series} v{volume}".

label.skip-cache: Skip the cache when fetching metadata.

scraping-series-page.page-title-with-volumes: Comic Series Scraping ({count, plural, =1{One Volume} other{# Volumes}})

text.notice-of-limits: When scraping a series, the publisher, series, volume, and individual issue reference are updated for each issue in the series. The full set of issue metadata is NOT retrieved.
